results.description: Australia batsman Marnus Labuschagne signs a new contract with Glamorgan after his starring role in the Ashes series against England.
results.shortTitle: Labuschagne signs new Glamorgan deal
results.title: Marnus Labuschagne: Glamorgan sign Australia batsman to two-year deal

results.description: Glamorgan re-appoint Matthew Maynard as head coach for the next three years after an interim role in 2019.
results.shortTitle: Maynard retains Glamorgan coaching job
results.title: Matthew Maynard: Glamorgan re-appoint coach on three-year deal

results.description: Glamorgan hand new one-year contracts to keeper-batsman Tom Cullen and all-rounder Owen Morgan.
results.shortTitle: New Glam deals for Cullen and Morgan
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: New contracts for Cullen and Morgan

results.description: Glamorgan announce a contract extension for Graham Wagg and remain hopeful of re-signing Australian star Marnus Labuschagne.
results.shortTitle: New Glamorgan deal for all-rounder Wagg
results.title: Glamorgan: New deal for all-rounder Graham Wagg

results.description: Glamorgan veteran Michael Hogan is awarded a testimonial season by the county, but rules himself out of the new Hundred competition.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's Hogan awarded testimonial
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: Michael Hogan awarded testimonial

results.description: Glamorgan's former South Africa fast bowler Marchant de Lange signs a new two-year contract at the club.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's De Lange signs new contract
results.title: Marchant de Lange: Glamorgan hand new deal to ex-South Africa paceman

results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.
results.shortTitle: County ins and outs
results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Ethan Bamber takes a maiden five-wicket haul and Leus du Plooy scores a century as Middlesex and Derbyshire draw at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: Middlesex and Derbys settle for draw
results.title: County Championship: Middlesex and Derbyshire draw weather-hit final day

results.description: Leicestershire opener Hassan Azad compiles his eighth half-century of the season as the Foxes draw with Lancashire.
results.shortTitle: Azad shines again as Leics and Lancs draw
results.title: County Championship: Hassan Azad makes unbeaten 83 as Leicestershire and Lancashire draw

results.description: Gloucestershire and Northants players celebrate promotion to Division One of the County Championship after Glamorgan's draw with Durham sees both sides go up.
results.shortTitle: Watch Glos & Northants celebrate promotion
results.title: County Championship: Watch Gloucestershire and Northants players celebrate promotion to Division One

results.description: Sussex and Worcestershire draw after the final day of their Division Two game is abandoned without a ball being bowled.
results.shortTitle: Sussex and Worcs draw after abandonment
results.title: County Championship: Sussex and Worcestershire draw after abandonment

results.description: Leicestershire edge ahead of Division Two champions Lancashire as the game drifts towards a draw at Grace Road.
results.shortTitle: Leics edge past Lancs as draw looms
results.title: County Championship: Leicestershire edge past Lancashire as draw looms in rain-affected game at Grace Road

results.description: Gloucestershire and Northants are still waiting to confirm their promotion to Division One following another rain-shortened day in Bristol.
results.shortTitle: Glos & Northants set to be promoted
results.title: County Championship: Gloucestershire & Northants kept waiting for promotion

results.description: Leus du Plooy and Harvey Hosein both score half-centuries as Derbyshire have the better of day three at Middlesex.
results.shortTitle: Derbyshire shade day three at Middlesex
results.title: County Championship: Derbyshire shade day three at Middlesex

thumbnail.altText: Leus du Plooy in action for Derbyshire

results.description: Relive day four of the final round of County Championship games as Essex won the title and Gloucestershire and Northants secured promotion.
results.shortTitle: County Championship - Essex win County Championship after dramatic draw at Somerset
results.title: County Championship latest - day four as it happened

results.description: Glamorgan's outside promotion hopes are dampened as day three of their match against Durham is rained off in Chester-le-Street.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan promotion hopes fade in Durham
results.title: County Championship: Glamorgan promotion hopes fade in Durham

results.description: Australia batsman Travis Head joins Sussex for the entire 2020 season, playing in all formats of the game.
results.shortTitle: Australian batsman Head joins Sussex
results.title: Travis Head: Australian batsman joins Sussex for entire 2020 season

thumbnail.altText: Travis Head in action for Australia in the Ashes

results.description: Sussex bat on to reach 299-8 against Worcestershire in the 35 overs possible on another rain-hit day at Hove.
results.shortTitle: Sussex build after rain-hit day at Hove
results.title: County Championship: Sussex bat on at Hove on another rain-hit day against Worcestershire

thumbnail.altText: Charlie Morris (left) and Ed Barnard took a wicket each to go to 44 Championship scalps in their private battle to finish top Worcestershire wicket taker this season

results.description: Only 8.4 overs are possible on the second day of Middlesex's Division Two game against Derbyshire because of heavy rain at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: Middlesex & Derbys halted by Lord's rain
results.title: County Championship: Only 8.4 overs possible on day two of Middlesex v Derbyshire

results.description: Heavy rain badly affects Tuesday's County Championship, with four games abandoned without a ball bowled.
results.shortTitle: Rain affects second day of Championship
results.title: County Championship: No play possible in four games on Tuesday
